00004 #include <iostream>

00009 class GridPos {
00010 public:
00012      int c;
00014      int r;
00016      GridPos() : c(0), r(0) {}
00018      GridPos(int ir, int ic) : c(ic), r(ir) {}
00020      inline bool operator == (const GridPos &p) const { return ( (p.r == r) && (p.c == c) ); }
00023      inline bool operator <  (const GridPos &p) const { return ((r < p.r) || ( (r == p.r) && (c < p.c) )); }
00025      friend std::ostream &operator<<(std::ostream &os, const GridPos &p) {
00026           return os << "r: " << p.r << ", c: " << p.c;
00027      }
00028 };
